评论详情: Good quality

评论概述: Cozy, Flattering, and Perfect for Busy Moms!
评论详情: As a 40-year-old mom, finding a top that’s comfortable, stylish, and forgiving is a win—and this shirt checks all the boxes! The stretchy, buttery-soft fabric hugs in all the right places while still feeling cozy. I love how the ribbed design and solid color give it a polished look, but it still feels casual enough for busy days. It’s great for those moments when I want to feel put together but need a little extra coverage. Definitely a wardrobe staple for me!

The material is super nice. It’s a thick material but still breathable quality is really good. The only thing is if you’re looking for a longer shirt, these are probably not for you. I’m 5’8 and I wish it was a little bit longer. They literally fit me right under my belly button

This is a great shirt for everyday wear or layering. I use it under my scrubs at work and I have multiple colors. It’s nice thick material. It’s fitted which is nice and the material is soft and very stretchy.

This shirt is so soft and a very high quality fabric! Very well made. I am 5ft and 134 lbs. I usually wear small to medium. I would definitely recommend sizing up one size for a more comfortable fit. Order true to size if you want a snug tight fit. I will definitely be ordering in as many colors as possible!! Get some for layering.. you won’t be sorry.
Exactly what I was looking for- true to size, soft, and just the right amount of thickness to not be see through bc I bought white.

I love these shirts!  I've bought two black and two white now and going to buy my third of each shortly.  The material is high quality.  They're thick and have slight compression, but not so much so that you're too hot or feeling like you're being suffocated.  The fit is perfect -- very comfortable and easy to wear.  I've washed them a few times now and they still look brand new.  This is a GREAT long sleeve shirt and fits TTS.  I'm 5'7", 160 lbs and bought a medium. I have recommended them to all my friends.

I'm tall, it's hard to find anything that has the right length, let alone keeps the length without shrinking. Sadly, this only lasted a few months before it shrank to the point I can't wear it anymore.

评论用户: They work great!! They have better base than apple!
评论详情: These shirts are the best I’ve seen. They are not too thin or too thick. The white is not see through either. I have 4 colors so far and will be ordering more.
This is the perfect winter basic. I love the fabric and thickness. It layers easily underneath sweaters and sweatshirts.
I never know what to expect when I order clothes on Amazon. This shirt was surprisingly good quality. Thick material with a bit of stretch that makes it more flattering. True to size.
Great shirt, material is think, and stretchy. Nice quality. Will buy in more colors.

Ordered this to wear under a dress to keep warm for a trip to Chicago. I wasn’t expecting the quality to be as amazing as it is. Feels high-quality, size is perfect, it’s long enough to be tucked in, but not so long that you have to. Great for layering or wearing alone. Will absolutely buy more colors in this. It’s flattering and even the cream color I bought isn’t see through.
The shirt adds a soft, yet warm layer to my cold weather clothes and it fits my petite body well. I bought one in black and one in white; well-made and well done.
There’s a nice stretch to this shirt.  It has a longer length which I love and the sleeves are longer as well!  Exactly what I expected for the price paid!

When this shirt arrived, I was wondering why it felt so thick in the package. I did not notice that it was fleece lined when I ordered it. It's super soft and warm. Good quality and it fits nice and snug.

评论概述: Soft and thick long sleeve you need
评论详情: I love this quality of long sleeve shirt because it’s a little thicker than a normal cotton long sleeve shirt, which is what I was looking for. It’s got a soft inside and a ridged outside and is kind of compressed but with movement. Very flattering, great fabric and great for a basic staple
This item arrived without a tag and with a small grease stain on the chest. It smells of laundry detergent.  It most definitely looks second hand.  I am returning this item for a refund.

评论概述: FAVORITE for layering or casual wear
评论详情: I love these so much that I have 5 colors and want more.  They are perfect for layering or casual wear.  They are lightly 'fleecy' on the inside, which makes them warm.  The fit is snug, but forgiving around the middle because, at least on someone shorter, they kind of scrunch.  I am 5'4" 150 lbs and order the large.  Even at 60 years old, the fit of these is flattering and makes me feel youthful.  I don't dry mine in the dryer, but I think they would probably be fine.  The red and black are very vivid and the white is truly white.  The khaki isn't quite like pictured but is still a versatile option.  I recommend!

I enjoyed this shirt but ended up returning it. There was nothing wrong with the quality as it was good/thick material. There was also a fleece lining which is great for the winter. I needed something a little lighter as the fleece was making me too hot. If there wasn’t fleece I would have kept it.

The fabric is weird, it’s really thick and the inside is kind of lined with fleece almost, but because it’s so thick it doesn’t stay stretched how you want and the arms are really short. I’m 5’7 and the L was about three inches shy of my wrist for the sleeve. I had ordered four colors and returned the others
Fabric is nice, thicker than I thought, fits well. I’m constantly pulling it down though whenever I’m walking around.

I was looking for something fitted as I navigate a 20-pound weight loss at 13 months postpartum. These shirts are PERFECT. The exterior is ribbed and the inside is just slightly fuzzy like a micro-mini fleece. The quality greatly exceeds the price. Just to be on the safe side I am hang-drying the three shirts I bought. I really do feel “snatched” in these shirts — but my wallet is still thick. Definitely a quality dupe.
Love the fabric. Washes great. Not clingy and doesn’t bag out after wearing.

These shirts are thick and hold their shape. Can’t see through them and they hold up well. True to size. I’m 5’3”, 108 lbs and 34 C. Small fit well. Thin enough to wear under scrubs but can be worn solo.

评论概述: Cute but a little loose fitting
评论详情: I like the shirt and the quality of the fabric and how it stretches, but the shirt as a whole is a little too loose around the belly for my style. It is comfy and doesn’t squeeze me which is good, but it also doesn’t give much shape to my body either. Not a bad shirt just not the fit I was looking for!
This is a great shirt, more like a compression shirt.  It is thick but breathable.  Super comfy.  I bought several different colors.
Nice sleek fit and comfortable material.

I bought this top in 7 colors after trying on the first one. It's thick and stretchy, the length is perfect (and I'm very short so I'm used to having to hem everything, even tops). The neck edge is sturdy, not going to stretch out. They come out of the washer and dryer like new.  I will probably buy the rest of the colors when they go on sale again.
Not so strechable!
I love this top! Fits perfectly and looks amazing
Great stretch and washes well.
The fit is very forming and may be a little snug if you don’t like a tight fit. The material is great and it’s comfortable to wear. I liked it so much I bought it in 2 colors.
True to size and fits well very comfortable and stretchy works great with multiple outfits as either your top shirt or as an under shirt
I love this shirt, fits very well and is comfortable! The quality is very good and soft.
This shirt is high quality and fits nicely.
I didn’t expect to love this top as much as I did. Rubbed outside but soft inside. Very flattering. I bought it in 2 colors
I was shocked by the quality and overall high end feel. I bought two of these and wish I had got more while they were on sale. These are great for layering.

I bought 2 size smalls for my daughter and they are bigger than what a medium would be.The material is shape fitting and would be good if the proper size
I love this top it goes great with my track suits.  Very comfortable
I bought this shirt for a costume and it’s quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. It’s soft and cute. I love it.
I love this shirt so much I got more. It’s soft and is very flattering

I liked the style, and I thought the fabric was fine. Alas, the top was so tight that I couldn't wear it so I haven't actually tested it. I ordered the same size that I use for all my orders. Be warned.

This is sooo comfy, I get hot easy, its warm but not hot. Its breathable. Feels like really high quality. Be careful taking off the tag. Its right on the seam so if you tear it, it puts a hole in the shirt. Customer error!
Surprisingly comfy! Soft and warm. Perfect for layering. Got this in 3 colors!

Warm and perfect fit. Perfect for winter
I love this long sleeved top.  It is stretchy but it keeps its shape for a snug fit.  I got it in blue as well.  I usually wear a medium and that is what I ordered so its true to size.

Very nice quality and fit. Hugs in all the right places with nice stretch. Fabric is thick enough that even the white is opaque enough to not show my bra through it. Will definitely be ordering more colors.

Cute, comfy, and true size.  My daughter loves it.

The color and material are nice but the sleeves are unusually SHORT! I am 5’6 130 lbs, so I’m not unusually large. I bought a medium and the sleeves fit more like a 3/4 sleeve which I’m bummed about. But if you’re a shorter person I think this would be a cute shirt!

This shirt I have in about 4 colors! The fit is perfection not to tight and constructing but fitting nice and smoothing. Not to hot but not to thin either. Perfect to pair with a vest or on its own. Stretchy too!

super comfy you can’t go wrong with this basic top. been wearing it to work its not see through and its comfortable

I ordered the khaki and brown. Great quality but there was a huge colored spot on the khaki one that won't wash out. I can't wear it. The brown one is wonderful.  Comfortable.  Great fit. Warm.
I am on a mission to find a white shirt that isn't see through. I had hopes for this because it's a bit thick but still kind of see through. I might get a bigger size to see tho
Amazing material and very comfortable. The material is thick, but very stretchy. I am 5’4, 185 and bought a size LG. It fits amazing!
Fit exactly like I wanted it! Very soft and comfortable. Would buy again.

I went by reviews and got a medium in this color but ordered a large in another just to be sure and reviews and sizing said medium would fit. Way way too small. I usually wear a medium in everything so it was upsetting. The quality is super. I mean it’s a great quality shirt but I needed this color immediately for another shirt to put under it. I was so uncomfortable wearing it. I wish so badly I would have just returned it and ordered it in another bigger side! The large in mint green was better but still small. If you don’t want these like compression shirts order a size or two up from your normal size. Super clingy and shows every flaw.
I had to bug these in every color, I like to wear these with my north face vest

Once its washed and dried, it WILL shrink. Not so much outwards, but the sleeves and it gets shorter. I find myself pulling it a lot. I am 5'7 and 148lbs. I usually wear a medium, if its fitted I will buy a large sometimes. This one I need an XL so that it covers the torso area :/. Overall its a very nice basic shirt. I definitely plan on buying more, now that I know accurate sizing.

I was having such a hard time finding a simple long sleeve shirt at all of the physical stores, BUT also wasn’t flimsy (Ross, TJ Maxx, Marshall’s, Nordstrom Rack, Target, Zara, etc.) I’m shocked with the quality of an Amazon shirt. It’s thicker than what I’ve been finding, but the material doesn’t make you hot. My concern was my “back fat” being produced by my bra. All of the flimsy shirts I found only pronounced my back.
Very nice medium thickness fabric. It fits just right and doesn’t slide up. I bought 2 more in different colors.

This shirt was excellent from its material to the fit and stretch. I would definitely say it is sized true size, there is a fleece feeling on the inside that keeps you nice and warm, and the stretch is awesome! Love it so much I had to buy more colors lol I already have three!
This shirt has it all! Soft, warm and stretchy. Looks great on its own or layered
Good quality, holds its shape.  Really like the softness of the inside of the fabric.  Bought one, then immediately ordered 4 more in different colors.

Very nice. Stretchy and soft. Has some compression and warmth. Perfect for fall and winter. I got a medium and I’m 5’5” 160  bra size C cup fits tight but well. If you wanted more room I would size up.

This shirt is very nice - I ordered several colors, including black and white, to replace some older tops. They are heavier than most on this site, but very nice and still stretchy and fitted. The sizing between colors is a little off.  I am 5’7”, 140 lbs, 36-b bust and the large in white fit perfectly - not too snug, not too loose.  The colors were a little snug and did not have much “wiggle room.”  Ordered XL in colors and overall fit was better, though the sleeves were 1/2” longer. Will keep both sizes as I really like the shirt. I don’t like big boxy tops, and these are perfect - stretchy, fitted, and heavy enough to wear alone, no layering needed.
I ordered small which I usually am, but could have sized down for a tighter fit.

Great layering shirt. Fits great and looks good under anything or on its own. Just enough stretch to fit right and not hunch up. Thin ish and not too warm. Exactly what I was looking for. Would highly recommend.
